name: 2018-3-1-e38
title: EDITORIAL GUIDELINES TO WRITE SCIENTIFIC ARTICLES
description: This article aims at helping authors who wish to submit their work to our journal to produce a piece of work written according to our methodological and editorial standards to ensure greater possibilities of being accepted by external evaluators and our journal’s editorial committee.
